features: Ergonomic Design - The S-curved backrest, U-shaped seat with side support, and thick cushion offer ergonomic comfort, reducing body pressure.
Adaptable Armrest - The flip-up armrest promotes adaptability for various setups and space-saving efficiency.
Sturdiness Assured - For optimal safety and longevity, each component, such as the gas lift, metal base, and dual casters, holds a BIFMA certification.
Finest Leather - Made from premium, multi-layered, wear-resistant PU leather with detailed embroidery, and easy to clean.
Personalized Comfort - Adjustable features such as height adjustment, tilting feature, and 360-degree swivel enhance your convenience to suit your specific needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars N-GEN Video Gaming Computer Chair - A Young Gamer's Throne of Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: The N-GEN Video Gaming Computer Chair has transformed my 10-year-old son's gaming and study space into a haven of comfort and style. This ergonomic office chair is nothing short of impressive, and here's why it deserves a solid 5-star review:Ergonomic Design for Young Users: 🎮The ergonomic design of this chair is tailor-made for young users like my son. The lumbar support and contoured shape provide a comfortable seating experience, ensuring that extended gaming sessions or study periods don't result in discomfort or fatigue.Adjustable Features for Growing Bodies: 📏One of the standout features of the N-GEN chair is its adjustability. The height can be easily customized to accommodate my son's growing body, providing proper support for his desk activities. This thoughtful design ensures that the chair grows with him.Stylish and Gamer-Approved Aesthetics: 🚀The sleek and gamer-approved aesthetics of this chair have earned it extra points in my son's book. The vibrant colors and cool design make it a standout piece in his room, aligning perfectly with his gaming setup. It adds a touch of style to the overall decor.Comfortable Padding and Upholstery: 🛋️The padding and upholstery of the N-GEN chair are plush and comfortable. The soft material adds to the overall comfort, making it an inviting seat for both gaming and study sessions. The quality of the padding ensures durability and long-term comfort.360-Degree Swivel and Smooth Rolling: 🔄The 360-degree swivel feature and smooth-rolling casters allow my son to move freely without getting up from his seat. Whether he needs to reach for something across the room or simply spin around for a victory dance after a game, the chair accommodates his every move.Sturdy Construction: 🔧The chair's sturdy construction is evident in its stability and durability. It can withstand the energy and occasional excitement of a 10-year-old without compromising on safety. The robust build instills confidence in its longevity and ability to endure regular use.Easy Assembly: 🛠️Assembling the N-GEN chair was a breeze. The clear instructions and labeled parts made the process straightforward. Within a short time, my son had his new gaming throne ready for action, and I appreciated the hassle-free assembly.Lumbar Support for Healthy Posture: 🪑The lumbar support in this chair promotes a healthy posture for my son. Whether he's gaming, studying, or just relaxing, the chair encourages proper spinal alignment, contributing to his overall well-being. The emphasis on ergonomics is a crucial aspect for young users.Parent-Approved Safety: 👍As a parent, safety is a top priority, and the N-GEN chair has met my expectations in this regard. The stable base, secure casters, and overall design prioritize safety without compromising on the chair's fun and functional aspects.Conclusion: 🌟In conclusion, the N-GEN Video Gaming Computer Chair is a 5-star addition to our home. With its ergonomic design, adjustable features, stylish aesthetics, comfortable padding, 360-degree swivel, sturdy construction, easy assembly, lumbar support, and parent-approved safety, it has become a vital piece of my son's gaming and study environment. If you're in search of a chair that balances comfort, style, and functionality for a young gamer, the N-GEN chair is an excellent choice. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value amazing quality!
reviews.reviewText: I got this chair to replace my current gaming chair that I also use for working remotely. I spend most of my day glued to my desk in my chair, so it was important that I got a comfortable chair that'll last me a while. My last chair didn't have the best seat so I definitely needed an upgrade. I've used this chair and I can immediately tell the difference in how comfortable it is. Here are some details:ASSEMBLY: Super quick and simple, great quality hardware and feels sturdy right off the bat. The tools inclued in are also great quality for the price. Less than 20 minutes.MATERIALS: One thing I noticed was how nice the faux leather is. It's not the type to crumble and peel. It's soft, not too shiny, thick, and feels really nice to sit with shorts on (!!!). Doesn't collect sweat. Pretty important during the Summer.COMFORT: It's got a nice thick seat and it's actually got pretty decent back support that I wasn't expecting. It kept me upright for most of my work day and felt way better after almost a 13 hour day too. Really loving it so far. The seat itself actually supports you too with how it's shaped.WHEELS: An important part to people with carpets (me). It rolls well and doesn't have a mind of it's own. Not flimsy. The base is also made out of metal which was an upgrade for me as well.DESIGN: It looks great too. The seat is bigger than I thought and decently high back too. With it being spacious for me, it still doesn't have any extra bulk which is nice. The addition of the nice textured leather on the all black chair is also great aesthetics.10/10 recommended. It's a GREAT value for what you get at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly nice chair for the price point. Assembly instructions are in video format and paper. Nice touch. Chair is comfortable. I love that the arm rests can be adjusted up, so the chair slides under the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great chair.Sits well.Only negatives I have are no wheel brake, and the seat seems a bit thin. It isn't bad thin, don't get me wrong.Putting it together is made simple, for the less mechanically inclined.While it does lean back, it's only done through the twist thing underneath. The armrests are great and if you are a MUSICIAN, they life out of the way.It's wide enough for bigger peeps.All in all, a solid PC Chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and worth the price
reviews.reviewText: When ordering anything at a price that seems to be too good to be true, I tend to worry. I had ordered two of these as gifts. They came is quickly, and had ZERO damage. No weird or chemical smells. Assembly is very easy and what is provided is all you need. Putting these chairs together took less than 5 minutes each. They are very comfy as well. Highly recommend. (Chairs purchased for one teen and 10 year old)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is super comfy and it's PINK! I love the color. It matches my setup perfectly and it was super easy to put together. I think in total it took me about 10-15 minutes. Also bought in black for my hubby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it!!! This is her second one... she sits in this chair most of the day because she has online classes. She says it is so comfortable & loves the support on her back. The color pink is super cute & matches her room. My husband & I put it together & it didn't take long at all. The instructions were very easy to follow & all the parts were there.She loves the handles on it & says its super comfortable.
